SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MainController extends Object implements Serializable
This class implements the methods to join automatically the client to the games. It also destroys the games if a client is not longer reachable.
See Also:

    • connect

      public void connect(VirtualView client, String nickname)
      Joins the new client to an existing game if there's any game with available player, otherwise it set the client's state to creator.
      Parameters:
      client - Virtual view representing the client
      nickname - client's nickname

    • createWaitingList

      public void createWaitingList(VirtualView client, String nickname, int numPlayers)
      Initializes the waiting list of players and updating max numbers of players for the next game
      Parameters:
      client - Virtual view representing the client
      nickname - nickname of the player who is initializing the waiting list
      numPlayers - number of players of the next game

    • joinWaitingList

      public void joinWaitingList(VirtualView client, String nickname)
      Adds a player into the waiting list, if exists
      Parameters:
      client - view to call methods in the client side
      nickname - Nickname of the player who is joining the waiting list

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController(int gameControllerID)
      Returns the game controller if exists.
      Parameters:
      gameControllerID - unique identifier for the game
      Returns:
      Returns the right game controller based on the id

    • recreateGames

      public void recreateGames() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Reconstruct every game controller from the disk
      Throws:
      IOException - if connection is not restored
      ClassNotFoundException - if class is not found
